comment: As long as you do the work you pass. The assignments were easy to understand and messages would show up when an assignment was close to being due.

Rick was one of the most annoying profs I have ever taken. Basically all of the work is busy work and an easy A, just annoying. There were like 13 online quizzes based on the ready (again easy- just skim it). He likes using technology but sucks at it, he screwed up online assignments so many times. A few group projects.
